title: Bill Signed: H.R. 941 | The White House
content: On Wednesday, May 26, 2021, the President signed into law:H.R. 941, the “Timely ReAuthorization of Necessary Stem-cell Programs Lends Access to Needed Therapies Act of 2021 or the TRANSPLANT Act of 2021,” which reauthorizes stem cell programs.Thank you to Representatives Doris Matsui, Gus Bilirakis and Chellie Pingree, as well as Senators Jack Reed, Richard Burr, Tina Smith, Tim Scott, and Tammy Duckworth for all their work.
